metadata.title: CVE-2021-3476 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in OpenEXR's B44 uncompression functionality in versions before 3.0.0-beta. An attacker who is able to submit a crafted file to OpenEXR could trigger shift overflows, potentially affecting application availability.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-3476` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenexr25 - 2.5.4-2
openexr - 2.5.4-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openexr package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.4-2').
